## Source: ossf-package-analysis (09357c4f7df25348b725c739c5c4942a9eebf22af49c805a85005565688b53b0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'gr-mg' @ 99.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
